column1: Events that occurred on
==On Earth==
* 1954 - The Fellowship of the Ring is published.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Michael George Tolkien (29 July 1966)
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Max Rouslin
* 1985 - Mythcon 16 in wikipedia:Wheaton
* 1988 - Mythcon 19 in wikipedia:Berkeley
* 1989 - Mythcon 20 at wikipedia:University of British Columbia
* 1991 - Mythcon 22 in wikipedia:San Diego
* 1994 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 1 is published.
* 1996 - Mythcon 27 at wikipedia:University of Colorado at Boulder in wikipedia:Boulder
* 2002 - Mythcon 33 at wikipedia:Boulder
* 2004 - Mythcon 35 at wikipedia:University of Michigan in wikipedia:Ann Arbor
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Heinz Hall in wikipedia:Pittsburgh
* 2006 - ELF 2006 in wikipedia:Secaucus
* 2007 - MerpCon III in wikipedia:Spokane
* 2008 - The Hobbit (1968 radio series) of The Hobbit is re-released in the USA including interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien.
* 2014 - Producer and interviewer Denys Gueroult dies.
==In Arda==
